message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget considerations.  Considering the true value of this product, I could come down to $1,450,000. This feels like a fair compromise. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,450,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
